organic_results.title: Interscholastic Athletics and Delinquent Behavior: Appraisal or Applause?
organic_results.snippet: Landers and Landers (1978) have recently purported to assess whether the socialization effects of interscholastic athletics retard delinquent behavior. Rather than carefully appraising these effects, they unfortunately have merely added to the inadequacy of previous research on the socialization effects of sports that has been described by Stevenson (1975). Specifically, Landers and Landers 1) misrepresent empirical results of previous research, 2) use questionable methods, and 3) misinterpret their findings. Because …
